home.something-wr: Something went wrong! Please try again later...

auth.success: Your account was created successfully. Please confirm your E-Mail address to continue.
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts, please try again later or reset your password from the buttom link
auth.invalid-email: The email you provided, is not valid
auth.invalid-password: The password lenght must be 8 character long or greater
auth.invalid-repassword: The password you provided is not the same as main password
auth.reset-password-failed: We can't recover your password right now! Please try again later.
auth.reset-password-success: We've send you an email with instructions, how to recover your password!
auth.reset-key: Enter your key from the email
auth.reset-key-valid: Your key is valid, you'll be redirected to reset password page any moment!
auth.reset-key-invalid: Your key is invalid, please make sure you copied it correctly!
auth.password-notchanged: We have a problem with changing your password, please try again later!
auth.account-verification-failed: Account was not verified, please try again!
